text: (Dawudi atabanje kumva undi) aravuga ati “Rwose yaguhuguje kuba yagusabye intama yawe ngo ayongere mu ze. Kandi mu by’ukuri abenshi mu bafatanyije imitungo barahuguzanya, uretse ba bandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza; kandi ni bo bake.” Nuko Dawudi amenya ko twamugerageje asaba imbabazi Nyagasani we, yitura hasi yubamye, anicuza (kuri Allah)
